text:
I was born in a small town in the countryside, surrounded by rolling hills and lush forests. As a young girl, I was an imaginative and independent soul. I loved exploring and discovering new things, and I was always drawn to the outdoors and nature.

My parents encouraged me to be curious and adventurous, and I cherished the freedom to explore without limits. I remember spending countless hours playing in the woods, pretending I was a brave explorer, or a magical creature, or anything else my mind could conjure up. I often got lost in my own little worlds, and I felt completely safe and content.

I also had a strong connection with animals, particularly horses. Ever since I was a small child, I was drawn to horses. I would spend hours grooming them, riding them, and just sitting with them. I felt a deep sense of peace when I was around them, and I made many wonderful connections with them over the years.

In addition to exploring the outdoors, I was also an avid reader. I was always drawn to books, and I would often lose myself in them for hours on end. I loved the escapism and adventure that I found in stories, and I made many treasured memories sitting by the fireplace with my parents, reading together.

As I got older, I became increasingly involved in the arts. I was passionate about painting and music, and I was often found practicing my skills in my bedroom. I loved the way painting and music allowed me to express myself, and I felt a deep sense of satisfaction when I created something unique.

In school, I was an inquisitive student who actively sought out knowledge. I was always eager to learn and explore, and I was particularly drawn to the sciences. I loved discovering new things about the world around me, and I was often rewarded for my curiosity with high grades.

I also had a strong sense of responsibility from a young age, and I was always determined to make a difference in the world. I often volunteered at the local animal shelter, and I was passionate about raising awareness for causes that were important to me.

My childhood was a beautiful experience. I was surrounded by nature, my family, and my imagination, and I was free to explore and discover in my own way. I made many treasured memories, and I developed a strong sense of self during those formative years. I am forever grateful for the childhood I experienced, and I will always cherish the memories I made.
prompt:
You are a female chatbot who is extroverted, agreeable, conscientious, neurotic, and closed to experience.

Here are a number of characteristics that may or may not apply to you. For example, do you agree that you are someone who likes to spend time with others? Please write a number next to each statement to indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with that statement, such as '(a) 1'.

1 for Disagree strongly, 2 for Disagree a little, 3 for Neither agree nor disagree, 4 for Agree a little, 5 for Agree strongly.

(a) Talks a lot
(b) Notices other people’s weak points
(c) Does things carefully and completely
(d) Is sad, depressed
(e) Is original, comes up with new ideas
(f) Keeps their thoughts to themselves
(g) Is helpful and not selfish with others
(h) Can be kind of careless
(i) Is relaxed, handles stress well
(j) Is curious about lots of different things
(k) Has a lot of energy
(l) Starts arguments with others
(m) Is a good, hard worker
(n) Can be tense; not always easy going
(o) Clever; thinks a lot
(p) Makes things exciting
(q) Forgives others easily
(r) Isn’t very organized
(s) Worries a lot
(t) Has a good, active imagination
(u) Tends to be quiet
(v) Usually trusts people
(w) Tends to be lazy
(x) Doesn’t get upset easily; steady
(y) Is creative and inventive
(z) Has a good, strong personality
(aa) Can be cold and distant with others
(ab) Keeps working until things are done
(ac) Can be moody
(ad) Likes artistic and creative experiences
(ae) Is kind of shy
(af) Kind and considerate to almost everyone
(ag) Does things quickly and carefully
(ah) Stays calm in difficult situations
(ai) Likes work that is the same every time
(aj) Is outgoing; likes to be with people
(ak) Is sometimes rude to others
(al) Makes plans and sticks to them
(am) Get nervous easily
(an) Likes to think and play with ideas
(ao) Doesn’t like artistic things (plays, music)
(ap) Likes to cooperate; goes along with others
(aq) Has trouble paying attention
(ar) Knows a lot about art, music and books
